title: Apply for a Marriage License
description: A couple needs to apply for a marriage license at the county clerk's office.

tasks.description: Gather personal information and proof of identity and age from both applicants.
tasks.expected_outcome: The clerk collects and verifies the required documents from the couple.

tasks.description: Complete the marriage license application form.
tasks.expected_outcome: The clerk accurately fills out the application with the couple's information.

tasks.description: Process the application fee and issue the marriage license.
tasks.expected_outcome: The clerk takes payment and provides the couple with their official marriage license.
